item.title: implement parking lot
item.description: Assumptions: multiple levels check vehicle size APIs: boolean hasSpot(Vehicle v); boolean park(Vehicle v); boolean leave(Vehicle v); classes ParkingLot, Level, Vehicle, ParkingSpot, Car, Truck implement public enum VehicleSize { Compact(1), Large(2); private final int size; VehicleSize(int size) { this.size = size; } public int getSize() { return size; } } public abstract class Vehicle { public abstract VehicleSize getSize(); } public class Car extends Vehicle { @Override public Vehicle getSize() { return VehicleSize.
